name: When Words Don't Come Out
description:
Sometimes you want to say things that you don't. Maybe you feel they aren't important, maybe you feel the moment isn't right, sometimes you don't have the guts to do it. This is kind of about that.

I wanted to make a "slice of life" game. Just a short conversation, a part of a bigger whole. Like splashing your a bit of my life into a game. There's a graphic novel that I love that is full of panels that do that. This is rough and well, not sure if entirely successful but that's what I went for. I hope it works on some level at least.
